entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimize hangs and stops responding. #27301
  • First migration rollback does not delete the __EFMigrationsHistory table #27300
  • How to correctly configure a composite primary key with HasDefault() for Sqlite? #27299
  • After migrating 2.2.6 to 6.0.0 EF Core Migrations Snapshot problems #27298
  • Unnecessary join when GroupBy and Select #27297
  • Allow to customize an alias in model binding #27296
  • Support for EF Core 3.1 on .NET Framework #27294

Closed

  • `scaffold --data-annotations` no longer emits [Required] attributes. This causes issues running `ef dbcontext script` as required columns are emitted as NULLable #27270
  • Cannot use table 'AspNetRoles' for entity type 'AspNetRole' since it is being used for entity type 'IdentityRole' and potentially other entity types, but there is no linking relationship. #27251
  • Scaffolding tool is generating invalid C# code when generating many-to-many relationships #27295

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27072 - Suboptimal SQL generation for query with optional navigation, its collection navigation and lateral join #27302

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Query: Convert single result subquery comparison to null to Any operation #27284
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Query: Match correct predicate structure to convert apply to join #27292
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • Add <inheritdoc /> in migrations #27268
  • Fix ValueGenerated On Add Or Update, , make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26713
  • Fix parameter type mapping for Sqlite #27291
